alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Chickasaw; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 1:31PM CDT until July 14 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Chickasaw County in northeastern Mississippi... Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... Monroe County in northeastern Mississippi... Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 131 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Thrashers to near Pratts Friendship to near Houston, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Booneville, Amory, Aberdeen, Fulton, Baldwyn, Red Bay, Iuka, Verona, Okolona, Tombigbee State Park, Tishomingo State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Belmont, Shannon, Plantersville, Mantachie, Smithville and Burnsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Alcorn; Chickasaw; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Prentiss; Tishomingo
